mapper.insert: INSERT INTO torrents (info_hash, name, size, private_torrent) VALUES (#{infoHash}, #{name}, #{size}, #{privateTorrent}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE name = IF(name != VALUES(name), VALUES(name), name), size = IF(size != VALUES(size), VALUES(size), size), private_torrent = IF(private_torrent IS NULL AND VALUES(private_torrent) IS NOT NULL, VALUES(private_torrent), private_torrent)
mapper.select: SELECT id, info_hash, name, size, private_torrent FROM torrents WHERE info_hash = #{infoHash} limit 1
